name: Bounty Bash
description:
Controls:  Right click on the ground to move, left click to fire the Pirate Basher.

At the top of the screen you can see which pirates you need to bash to collect the current bounty.  After you bash a pirate your helper will come and haul them off to jail, but be careful, he will grab any pirates you bash, even if they're not in your bounty.

Once you collect a bounty the timer restarts and you given a harder bounty to complete.  How many bounties can you collect?
